description.value: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for pathogens, retrieved in February 2023. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation. Some information on DIVOC's test certificate can be found at https://github.com/egovernments/DIVOC/blob/main/test-certificate-context/test-certificate-context.js. Additional information on DIVOC can be found at <https://divoc.digit.org/platform/divocs-verifiable-certificate-features>

display.value: Concerns the detection of SARS-CoV-2 infection.
